comments:
I am unable to bootup eclipse with this configuration, I see the splash screen but no further startup occurs.  I found the following files being created each time I try to bootup:

/home/dlm/.eclipse/org.eclipse.platform_3.2.0/configuration/1158874434919.log

Have marked this report to Platform Update component as it appear that is throwing the first error.  If I use a brand new empty -configuration tree eclipse bootsup normally, so maybe it is some corruption.

I have saved the configuration just in case I can turn on some diagnostic to help attribute a cause.

Version is eclipse-SDK-M20060912-1730-linux-gtk-x86_64.tar.gz
